RelatedSentence: He will be retiring from his position in June after 39 years of service , 15 with Owosso .
Owosso Public Schools Director of Building and Grounds Dan Hock , right , was honored by Owosso Mayor Ben Frederick during Arbor Day festivities held May 10 .

A0: Owosso Mayor Ben Frederick during Arbor Day festivities held May 10
RelatedSentence: Frederick noted Hock 's leadership and care for the centuries - old oak grove on the Emerson Elementary property led to a 100 percent survival rate for the more than 50 trees planted there in 2013 .
Hock , 56 , began his career with South Lyon schools in 1975 as a custodian .
